title: Boot Enchant: Teleport temporarily disabled in Black Market Brawlers due to bug.
body: Heya guys, we've had to temporarily disable the _"Boot Enchant: Teleport"_ from the Black Market Brawlers featured game mode due to a bug. We're working on a fix and will have them back up as soon as we can. <3

replies.body: I kinda wish they added this notice with the GP one. It sucks to find this out in-game.
If I heard right the bug is you can still pick {{summoner:12}} at that game mode right??? I thought it disabled so the enchantment have its worth???

No. The bug was you could buy another enchantment while teleporting (hmm.....Homeguards?) and doing so would make it so the cooldown for the teleport enchantment would be nonexistent (so basically, homeguard tp from base is free anytime you want). If it was as simple as being able to pick the teleport enchantment, that would have been a really easy fix and be done within minutes.

what happen..i can't download game the message is Gangplank is dead and has been disabled in all queues.
could anybody help me or tell me what that is?
I had teleport and teleport on boots in one game :D
What is the bug? The only bug I had is that it had no sound.

It's no bug
try disabling all sound and than enabling it again :) i had same problem
It was if you were tping with the enchantment then quickly bought another enchantment, you would have both infinite tp and the other enchantment... {{item:1324}} {{item:1339}}
